title: Recycled Plastic Straws Craft - Michelle's Party Plan-It
body: Craft sticks Magnets Glue Start by setting your EasyPress 2 on the highest setting of 400 degrees for 60 seconds. If you are using an iron, set it on the highest setting without steam. Lay out several plastic straws on a heat protective sheet and place another sheet on top. Place your EasyPress or iron on top of the sheet for 1 minute.
